main.name: Emma Líf Jónsdóttir
main.description: who recently graduated from the University of Iceland. I am a progressive thinker with a positive attitude who is looking for the opportunity to work with an outstanding team.
main.bio: I grew up on a farm in Fljótsdalur, near Egilsstaðir in East Iceland. I am half Australian and have Australian citizenship, and when I was 14 years old I moved there with my family. I moved back to Iceland when I began upper secondary school. As soon as I graduated I moved to Denmark to chase my hobbies and spend a year attending a sports school. On my return to Iceland I commenced my degree with the University of Iceland.
main.bio1: Gymnastics has played a major role in my life and is my main hobby. I practiced it for most of my primary school years and since I started in upper secondary school I have been coaching competitive gymnastic teams and travelled the country to attend competitions. I hold a gymnastics judges certificate and today I am a well-respected gymnastics judge. Throughout my childhood I practiced chess and I was considered good at it considering that I won many trophies. When I was young I did a lot of horse riding and spent my summers with my family guiding tourists on the highlands.
main.bio2: I have now added a new hobby - programming. I have tremendous ambition for everything that is related to building software, most of all building websites.
main.contactmessage: I am very interested in working on challenging projects with a great team. Don't hesitate to contact me.

resume.skillmessage: I love learning new things, and here below is a brief review of my experience with programming languages.

education.description: Moved to Denmark to chase my hobbies and travel the world.

work.title: Foreman

work.title: Waitress
work.description: Waitressing at the hotels restaurant, working shifts.

skills.name: Java
skills.info: I have alot of experience in Java. Most of my projects from my previous job were implemented in Java. I've made several projets using Java - such as websites, webservices and apps.

skills.name: Javascript
skills.info: My favorite programming language. I've produced many websites using javascript - both from my previous job and from school. I also like to make my own websites using this programming lanugage.

skills.name: Python
skills.info: Simple and a neat programming language which is easy to learn, and I take pleasure in programming in. Main projects I've made using Python are in Natural Language Processing .

skills.name: React
skills.info: It is great too use React when making websites, and I love working with it, for example is this website made in React. I also have experience using Typescript, Next.js, Express and Apollo.

skills.name: C++
skills.info: I have a basic understanding with C++. It's not my favorite programming language but it's enjoyable to make fast solutions on projects using it.

skills.name: Java Spring
skills.info: I have used the Java Spring framwork alot in my projects. It's a neat tool to use in large Java projects and it's easy to use when implementing webservices.

skills.name: Git
skills.info: One of my favorite programming tools because it smplifies all teamwork. I have alot of experience working in Git and I am very used to using this tool.

skills.name: SQL
skills.info: I use SQL alot when it comes to working with databases. I have used many different types of SQL such as PostreSQL, SQLite and I have also experience in GraphQL.
